name: create-nts-app
description: Create Node TypeScript (nts) apps with no build configuration.
author: Dan Dombrowski <djdmbrwsk@gmail.com>

scripts.start:default: npm run clean && npm run build && cd .. && rimraf test-app && node create-nts-app/build/bin/create-nts-app test-app
scripts.start:local: npm run clean && npm run build && cd .. && rimraf test-app && node create-nts-app/build/bin/create-nts-app test-app --template file:nts-template
scripts.start:git: npm run clean && npm run build && cd .. && rimraf test-app && node create-nts-app/build/bin/create-nts-app test-app --template git@github.com:reduxjs/cra-template-redux.git
